General.Name: Infinitum Copper Corp
General.Description: Infinitum Copper Corp., mining exploration company, engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral properties in Mexico and the United States. The company explores for copper, gold, and silver deposits. Its flagship property is the La Adelita property covering an area of approximately 6,455 hectares located in the Sonora State, Mexico. The company also has an option to acquire 100% interest in the Hot Breccia project covering an area of approximately 1,442 hectares located in Arizona Copper Belt, the United States. The company was formerly known as Bayshore Petroleum Corp. and changed its name to Infinitum Copper Corp. in February 2022. Infinitum Copper Corp. was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: Guinness Tower, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 2E9
